translation.en: [man 1 over radio] We've got a homicide, possibly gang-related.
translation.zh: 发生了一起谋杀案 可能和帮派有关

translation.en: York Hotel.
translation.zh: 位于约克旅馆

translation.en: [man 2] Yeah, copy that, Control. 10-4.
translation.zh: 好 收到 了解

translation.en: York Hotel, as quick as you can.
translation.zh: 约克旅馆 尽快过去

translation.en: Thanks, sweetie.
translation.zh: 谢了 亲爱的

translation.en: Hey, Frank, how about a freebie? [laughing]
translation.zh: 弗兰克 想不想要免费来一次？

translation.en: -Detective Crankovich. -[cop] Sorry, Detective...?
translation.zh:
-克瑞科维奇警探
-抱歉 警探

translation.en: Mankovich. Frank. Frank Mankovich. Detective.
translation.zh:
曼克维奇 弗兰克
弗兰克曼克维奇 警探

translation.en: Don't let anybody through, especially the press.
translation.zh: 别让任何人通过 特别是媒体

translation.en: -Detective Hankovich. -[cops] Detective.
translation.zh: 汉克维奇警探

translation.en: Hey, we're part of the investigation. Detective Frank Wankovich.
translation.zh:
我们是调查人员
我是弗兰克旺克维奇警探

translation.en: Detective Claire Lady. What happened here?
translation.zh: 这是克莱尔女士警探 什么状况？

translation.en: I already told all your colleagues everything.
translation.zh: 我都已经跟你的同事说过了

translation.en: Well, you can tell me again, then.
translation.zh: 那你可以再跟我说一次

translation.en: Well, I was by reception and a man came in, and he was wearing a helmet
translation.zh:
我当时在柜台 有个人走进来
他带着安全帽

translation.en: and he had a gun with a silencer.
translation.zh: 手上拿了一把装有消音器的枪

translation.en: Mm-hm. And then?
translation.zh: 然后呢？

translation.en: Well, he pointed the gun at Mr. Ivanov
translation.zh:
他拿枪指着伊凡诺夫先生
大喊着些什么

translation.en: and shouted something in Russian, I think.
translation.zh:
他拿枪指着伊凡诺夫先生
大喊着些什么 我想是俄罗斯语吧

translation.en: Then he shot him.
translation.zh: 然后就对他开了枪

translation.en: -What did he look like? -[Perry] Bonneville.
translation.zh:
-他长什么样子？
-邦尼维尔！

translation.en: Superintendent.
translation.zh: 警司

translation.en: I'm not disturbing you, I hope, Bonneville?
translation.zh: 希望没打扰到你 邦尼维尔

translation.en: Oh. Not at all.
translation.zh: 完全不会

translation.en: Oh. Claire Maddox, Perry, head of homicide.
translation.zh:
克莱尔麦道克斯
这是派瑞 重案组组长

translation.en: -Hi. -Get out of here. Both of you.
translation.zh:
-你好
-你们两个都滚出去

translation.en: Right now. Or I'll slap you in custody.
translation.zh: 马上 否则我就把你们抓起来

translation.en: -Wait, you're not a detective? -No.
translation.zh:
-等等 你不是警探？
-不是

translation.en: My name is Frank, though. This wasn't all a lie.
translation.zh:
但我是叫弗兰克没错
那我可没说谎

translation.en: We had some good times, right?
translation.zh: 我们相处得还不错吧？

translation.en: -[man] Detective, a comment, please? -Okay, let them through.
translation.zh: 让他们过去

translation.en: -Hey. What? What are you doing? -He said let them through.
translation.zh:
-你在干嘛？
-他说让他们过去

translation.en: -You don't let anybody through. -Oh.
translation.zh: 不准让任何人通过

translation.en: Oh, I've gotta go, darling.
translation.zh: 我得挂了 亲爱的

translation.en: -[Frank] Get me the control room. -They're on.
translation.zh:
-帮我接中控室
-在线了

translation.en: -Hey. -[Mallard] So, you got a story, Frank?
translation.zh:
-喂
-有报道吗 弗兰克？

translation.en: "Russian Mafia Wars." How's that sound?
translation.zh: “俄罗斯黑手党大战”听起来如何？

translation.en: [Mallard] Okay. Let's do it now.
translation.zh: 好 现在就开始吧

translation.en: Standing by. And you're on.
translation.zh: 准备好 开始了

translation.en: At 8:45, Sergei Ivanov, a.k.a. Three Fingers,
translation.zh:
8点45分时
绰号“三指”的瑟杰伊凡诺夫

translation.en: a figure in the Russian Mafia, left his room at the York Hotel.
translation.zh:
这位俄罗斯黑帮的大人物
离开了他在约克旅馆的房间

translation.en: He'd just breakfasted on eggs, toast, and a black coffee. His last breakfast.
translation.zh: 他最后的早餐是鸡蛋 吐司和黑咖啡

translation.en: The sumptuous lifestyle and escapades of Sergei Ivanov,
translation.zh: 瑟杰伊凡诺夫过着奢华放荡的生活

translation.en: mover and shaker in the nightclubs of Manhattan and New Jersey...
translation.zh: 时常出入曼哈顿和新泽西的夜店

translation.en: Two minutes in the hotel and he comes out with a story.
translation.zh:
才进入旅馆两分钟
他出来就能报道了

translation.en: -A true artist. He's the best. -He's certainly the best at what he does.
translation.zh:
-了不起的艺术家 他最厉害了
-他确实是他这行的佼佼者

translation.en: ...a war that has only just begun. This is Frank Bonneville, 365 News.
translation.zh:
战争就要开始了
我是弗兰克邦尼维尔 365新闻

translation.en: That was great.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: -You need any help? -No, I'm fine. Won't be a minute.
translation.zh:
-需要帮忙吗？
-不用了 一下子就好

translation.en: "Darling."
translation.zh: “亲爱的”

translation.en: -Who was that, then, your girlfriend? -I'm married.
translation.zh:
-是谁？你女友吗？
-我结婚了

translation.en: So, it's his wife.
translation.zh: 所以是他老婆

translation.en: -[Finch] Yeah. -Eh! He's a player.
translation.zh:
-对
-够呛 他可是个花花公子

translation.en: -Aren't you, Finch? Huh? -[video game noises] -Chick in every port? -Nah.
translation.zh:
-对吧 芬奇？到处都有妞？
-没有

translation.en: -[Claire] You okay? -[Finch] Yeah, fine.
translation.zh:
-你没事吧？
-没事

translation.en: [Claire] You want a coffee? [Finch] Yeah, can I get a skim-milk latte?
translation.zh:
-要咖啡吗？
-可以给我低脂牛奶的拿铁吗？

translation.en: -[Claire] You on a diet? -[Finch] A bit, yeah.
translation.zh:
-你在节食吗？
-算是吧

translation.en: I had a medical, and apparently I'm 25 percent fat.
translation.zh:
我去做了体检
显然我有百分之二十五都是脂肪

translation.en: -Is that bad? -Yeah. It's more than some snacks.
translation.zh:
-是坏事吗？
-对 比正常人多

translation.en: -Okay. -See you later.
translation.zh:
-好吧
-晚点见

translation.en: There he is.
translation.zh: 他回来了

translation.en: Look at you.
translation.zh: 看看你

translation.en: First reporter with the story, again.
translation.zh: 又是抢到第一个报道的记者

translation.en: All other journalists banned from the site.
translation.zh: 其他记者都被禁止进入现场

translation.en: Oh, no, wait. What are these?
translation.zh: 不 等等 这是什么？

translation.en: "Impersonating an officer." "Tampering with a crime scene."
translation.zh: 假扮警察？破坏犯罪现场？

translation.en: -I got results. -You're not Dirty Harry!
translation.zh:
-我弄到新闻了
-你不是在演《紧急追捕令》

translation.en: At best, you're an underachiever at a local radio station.
translation.zh: 你顶多就只是当地广播电台的小人物

translation.en: Often, a drunk underachiever.
translation.zh: 通常还都是醉醺醺的

translation.en: -Would you rather I didn't get the story? -Than break the law? Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你宁可我报不到新闻吗？
-跟犯法相比？没错

translation.en: Why break the law? Plenty of news without having to break the law.
translation.zh:
为什么要犯法？
很多记者都不用犯法也能有新闻

translation.en: If you run out, make up a story about a lost dog.
translation.zh:
就算你没新闻了
可以编个小狗走失的嘛

translation.en: I made up a story about being a detective.
translation.zh: 我编了一个我是警探的故事

translation.en: One more slip-up and you're fired. This is coming from upstairs, not from me.
translation.zh:
你再出一次篓子 就走人了
这是上面说的 不是我

translation.en: They've had it. They don't need this anymore.
translation.zh: 他们受够了 不想再处理这种事了

translation.en: You're an arrogant, selfish hack who survives
translation.zh:
你是个傲慢 自大的混蛋
之所以还能生存

translation.en: because everyone thinks you're a local celebrity.
translation.zh: 是因为大家都觉得你是当地名人

translation.en: I can't fire you because I don't like you.
translation.zh: 我不能因为讨厌你就开除你

translation.en: But I can fire you if you break the law
translation.zh:
但我可以因为你犯法
或是你下一次又犯了什么规

translation.en: or for the next thing you do that breaks the rules.
translation.zh:
但我可以因为你犯法
或是你下一次又犯了什么规 而炒了你

translation.en: I so much as find out you used a disabled toilet, goodbye.
translation.zh:
只要被我发现你用了残障厕所
我就会要你走人

translation.en: -That's ridiculous. -Yeah, it's ridiculous.
translation.zh:
-这太荒谬了
-对 是很荒谬

translation.en: Go ahead, punk, make my day.
translation.zh:
来吧 混蛋 试试看啊
也让我高兴高兴

translation.en: -Will there be any celebrities? -The girl who reads the weather
translation.zh: 会有名人出席吗？ 报气象那个女生认识阿尔罗克

translation.en: -knows Al Roker. -Will he be here?
translation.zh:
报气象那个女生认识阿尔罗克 -那他会来吗？
-不会 但她或许会来

translation.en: No. She might, though.
translation.zh:
-那他会来吗？
-不会 但她或许会来

translation.en: Hey, Sacha. This is my wife, Eleanor.
translation.zh:
-你好
-我是沙查 这是我太太 爱莲诺

translation.en: -Oh, finally. Hi. -Hi.
translation.zh:
-久仰 你好
-你好

translation.en: -[Finch] Many in? -Uh, no. No, you're the first.
translation.zh:
-很多人到了吗？
-不 你们是最早到的

translation.en: -Someone has to be. -[Eleanor] Exactly.
translation.zh:
-总有人要当第一嘛
-没错

translation.en: And it's nice to be here in time to see the staff prepare
translation.zh: 能够及时到现场看到员工们准备

translation.en: for such a prestigious event.
translation.zh: 这么盛大的活动真的很棒

translation.en: [Finch] See you later. Okay, let's get in.
translation.zh: 等等见了 我们进去吧

translation.en: -Hi. -[woman] Hi.
translation.zh:
-你好
-你好

translation.en: Hi. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: -Balloons. -It's still sunny out.
translation.zh:
-气球
-外面太阳还好大

translation.en: Well, it's nearly July, isn't it?
translation.zh: 都快七月了 不是吗？

translation.en: -Doesn't get dark till 9:00. -Imagine going out in the darkness.
translation.zh:
-要到九点才会天黑
-想象一下出去一片黑暗

translation.en: -You're the first here. -Yeah, he doesn't like to be late.
translation.zh:
-你们最早到
-对 他不喜欢迟到

translation.en: -[bartender] Champagne? -[Finch] Don't mind if I do.
translation.zh:
-要香槟吗？
-麻烦你了

translation.en: There you go. Ah.
translation.zh: 请用

translation.en: So, what do you think of my little radio station event?
translation.zh: 你觉得我的电台活动如何？

translation.en: Well, I mean, if it was really your radio station, it would be something.
translation.zh:
我得说 如果真的是你的电台
那是很了不起的

translation.en: -Well, I'm chief sound engineer. -[soft music playing]
translation.zh: 我是音响工程主任

translation.en: And if you consider that radio is just sound,
translation.zh: 如果你认为广播就是声音

translation.en: I'm sort of chief engineer, really.
translation.zh: 那我其实就是总工程主任了

translation.en: In one of the biggest local radio stations around. Locally.
translation.zh: 而且是附近数一数二的电台

translation.en: It's just not what I thought you'd still be doing at 50.
translation.zh:
我只是没想到你五十岁了
还在做这个

translation.en: -What do you mean? -Radio.
translation.zh:
-什么意思？
-电台

translation.en: -Radio is like-- -It's what I love. Yeah, but it's just not very exciting.
translation.zh:
-这是我的热情所在
-对 但这不太刺激

translation.en: -You're joking. -No, I'm not joking. But go on, tell me.
translation.zh:
-你玩笑的吧？
-我没开玩笑 但说吧 告诉我

translation.en: What is the most exciting thing that's happened this week?
translation.zh: 这周发生过最刺激的事是什么？

translation.en: -Okay. Um... -Okay.
translation.zh:
-好
-好

translation.en: -Well, you decide. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-你决定吧
-好

translation.en: Is it that our omnibus podcast just made top 50 on iTunes?
translation.zh:
是我们的综合播客进了
iTunes排行的前五十名吗？

translation.en: Or, is it that Jamie Oliver popped in yesterday
translation.zh: 或者是杰米奥利佛昨天跑来

translation.en: -to talk to Stig Arnold about fat kids? -Is he gonna be here?
translation.zh:
-和斯蒂格阿诺德了肥小孩的事？
-他会来吗？

translation.en: -Stig's never missed a party yet. Heh. -I meant Jamie Oliver.
translation.zh:
-斯蒂格从不错过派对
-我是说杰米奥利佛

translation.en: Who knows?
translation.zh: 谁知道呢？

translation.en: -So, no, then? -No. Definitely not.
translation.zh:
-那就是不会了
-对 绝对不会

translation.en: -[sighs] -You meet Stig. You won't want to see Jamie Oliver after you've met Stig.
translation.zh:
你得见见斯蒂格 在见过斯蒂格之后
你可不会想见到杰米奥利佛

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Haven't you ever wanted to do something extraordinary?
translation.zh:
你难道没想过
要做点不同凡响的事吗？

translation.en: -[Mallard] Finch. -Hi.
translation.zh:
-芬奇
-你好

translation.en: Um, this is Geoffrey Mallard, the radio boss.
translation.zh: 这是杰佛瑞马拉德 电台老板

translation.en: -This is my wife, Eleanor. -Pleasure to meet you.
translation.zh:
-这是我太太 爱莲诺
-幸会

translation.en: I've been looking for you. Some lunatic took his family hostage.
translation.zh:
我一直在找你
某个疯子绑了自己家人当人质

translation.en: He's armed. I need you and Claire to go and cover it.
translation.zh:
他有带武器
我要你和克莱尔去采访报道

translation.en: -Now? -Yeah, I don't have a choice.
translation.zh:
-现在吗？
-对 我也别无选择

translation.en: You're the only guy around.
translation.zh: 只有你在

translation.en: -Where is Claire? -She's on her way here. Nice to meet you.
translation.zh:
-那克莱尔？
-她在路上了 很高兴见到你

translation.en: Okay, I'm so sorry, darling.
translation.zh: 好 对不起 亲爱的

translation.en: No, no, no, you're not leaving me here. I don't know anyone.
translation.zh:
不行 你不能把我一个人丢在这儿
我谁都不认识

translation.en: I don't have a choice. He said I'm the only guy that can do this.
translation.zh:
我也别无选择
你也听到他说的了 只有我可以做到

translation.en: -He said you're the only guy around. -He didn't literally mean
translation.zh:
-才不是 他说这里只有你在
-他的意思并不是…

translation.en: I'm the only guy around. He meant I'm the only guy around that can do this.
translation.zh:
只有我在这儿
他是说我是这里唯一可以做到的人

translation.en: -He's around, he couldn't do it. -You don't know that.
translation.zh:
-他就在 他就做不到
-你怎么知道？

translation.en: -Oh, come on. Look at him. -You can't do this to me. Come on.
translation.zh:
-拜托 你看看他
-你不能这样对我 拜托

translation.en: No. You know what? Forget it. I'm going home.
translation.zh: 不 那这样吧 算了 我要回家了

translation.en: Please don't. Don't, please. Just wait here and enjoy yourself
translation.zh:
拜托不要 别走 在这里等我
好好享受一下

translation.en: and I'll whiz back, and then we'll have a--
translation.zh: 我会悄悄回来 然后我们…

translation.en: -You're gonna be gone for hours. -No.
translation.zh:
-你会一去就是好几小时
-不

translation.en: In these situations the police usually get the gunman to the window really quickly
translation.zh:
这种情况中 警方通常都会
很快就把枪手引到窗边

translation.en: and shoot him through the top lip, and that takes out the brain stem,
translation.zh:
然后把子弹从人中射进去
这样脑干就会被破坏

translation.en: so there's no reflex... action.
translation.zh: 所以不会有反射动作

translation.en: -Hi. -Did you see Mallard?
translation.zh:
-你好
-你有看到马拉德吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Oh, uh, this is Claire Maddox. This is my wife, Eleanor.
translation.zh:
有 这是克莱尔麦道克斯
这是我太太 爱莲诺

translation.en: -Nice to meet you. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-幸会
-好

translation.en: -We should go. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-我们该走了
-好

translation.en: -See you in the lobby. -Yeah, okay.
translation.zh:
-大厅见
-好

translation.en: [Frank] Who's this? Is this Tony? Look at this guy.
translation.zh: 那是谁？东尼吗？看看这个人

translation.en: -[Finch] Anyway... -[Frank] How are you?
translation.zh:
-总之
-你好吗？

translation.en: -[Finch] I've gotta go. -Okay, fine, go.
translation.zh:
-我得走了
-好吧 去吧

translation.en: -Yeah? -Whatever.
translation.zh:
-真的吗？
-随便

translation.en: You'll be all right?
translation.zh: 你会没事吧？

translation.en: -I'll see you soon. Okay. -Okay, go if you're gonna go.
translation.zh:
-等等见 好吗？
-好啦 你要走就走

translation.en: -[woman] Hey, Frank. -Hey.
translation.zh: 喂

translation.en: -Hi. -[Claire] Hey.
translation.zh:
-你好
-你好

translation.en: Did you see Frank arrive, acting like he thinks he's James Bond?
translation.zh:
你有看到弗兰克进来
一副自以为是007的样子吗？

translation.en: Yeah. I think he's really cool. He doesn't care about anything. -[elevator bell dings] -Oh.
translation.zh: 我觉得他真的很酷 什么都不在乎

translation.en: -How is that cool? -Hi. -Hi. -[Finch] Oh...
translation.zh:
-这算哪门子的酷？
-那个…

translation.en: I don't know, I just...
translation.zh: 我不知道 我只是…

translation.en: -I just mean... -[doors close]
translation.zh: 我的意思是…

translation.en: I think it would be cool to be like that sometimes, you know?
translation.zh:
我觉得有时候能像他那样
是很酷的 你懂吗？

translation.en: I care about everything, and I try my best,
translation.zh: 我什么都放不下 我一直很努力

translation.en: but nothing much seems to happen. It's because I'm boring.
translation.zh:
但似乎还是一事无成
那是因为我是个无聊的人

translation.en: -Why do you say that? -Because it's true.
translation.zh:
-你为什么这么说？
-因为事实就是如此

translation.en: I... I've never done anything extraordinary.
translation.zh: 我没做过什么不同凡响的事

translation.en: I think that's why I play video games.
translation.zh: 所以我才打电子游戏吧

translation.en: Because they're more interesting than my real life.
translation.zh:
因为电子游戏
比我真实的人生有趣多了

translation.en: -Rebel Coup? -Yeah. Do you play?
translation.zh:
-“叛军政变”？
-对 你玩过吗？

translation.en: -I'm trying to cut down. -Yeah, me, too.
translation.zh:
-我正努力想戒掉
-我也是

translation.en: -Take that, sucker. -Nice move.
translation.zh:
-看看我的厉害 烂货
-漂亮

translation.en: Mr. Bonneville. I love your work.
translation.zh: 邦尼维尔先生 我热爱你的报道

translation.en: -Champagne? -Thank you. Cheers.
translation.zh:
-要香槟吗？
-谢谢你 干杯

translation.en: You're the Frank Bonneville?
translation.zh: 你就是那个弗兰克邦尼维尔？

translation.en: -Apparently. -I listen to you every day.
translation.zh:
-显然是
-我每天都会听你的报道

translation.en: -Really? -I wouldn't miss it.
translation.zh:
-真的吗？
-绝不会错过

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
translation.zh:
-谢谢
-不客气

translation.en: Alone?
translation.zh: 你一个人？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Me, too.
translation.zh:
-对
-我也是

translation.en: It's a lonely life, radio.
translation.zh: 广播的节目是很孤独的

translation.en: -Tell me about it. -It's so unglamorous.
translation.zh:
-还用说吗？
-乏味透了

translation.en: Yes, I know. I was just saying that to my... self.
translation.zh: 对 没错 我刚才这么想呢

translation.en: Let me guess. PR.
translation.zh: 我猜猜 你是公关部的？

translation.en: Yes. Yes. How did you know?
translation.zh: 对 你怎么知道？

translation.en: Well, come on. You're too attractive for Human Resources.
translation.zh:
拜托 你太辣了
不可能是人力资源的

translation.en: -And not bitter enough for management. -That's nice. I'm flattered.
translation.zh:
-但又不像管理部那般尖酸
-真会说 我好开心

translation.en: Why radio? Why not TV or something more stimulating?
translation.zh:
为什么要选电台？而不是电视？
或是更刺激的？

translation.en: -It's what I love. -Cheers.
translation.zh:
-这是我的热情所在
-干杯

translation.en: -It's what I hate. -No. Come on.
translation.zh:
-我超恨这份工作
-不会吧

translation.en: -Yeah. -Oh, you are so good at it.
translation.zh:
-真的
-但你很擅长啊

translation.en: -Like, you exude passion. -No.
translation.zh:
-火力四射
-少来了

translation.en: -It really comes across. -That's not passion.
translation.zh:
-真的很有影响力
-那不是热情

translation.en: -Yeah. -That's frustration.
translation.zh:
-不是？
-是沮丧

translation.en: I'm destined for bigger things, and I know it.
translation.zh:
我命中注定能有更大的成就
我很清楚

translation.en: So, in the meantime, it's just like I'm a big fish in a little pond.
translation.zh:
所以与此同时
我就像是被困在小池中的大鱼

translation.en: -Yeah. -A big... angry fish.
translation.zh:
-我懂
-一条又大又愤怒的鱼

translation.en: -Yeah. [laughing] -Big, drunk, angry fish, in a tiny,
translation.zh:
-对
-又大又醉又愤怒的鱼 在一个

translation.en: -shitty little pond. -No. You know what?
translation.zh:
-小烂池塘
-不 你知道吗？

translation.en: -At least you're honest about it. -Where's that got me? Nowhere.
translation.zh:
-至少你很诚实
-又有什么好处？一点也没

translation.en: No more "Mr. Nice Guy," you know? Here's to cheating.
translation.zh: 不想再当好好先生了 敬作弊

translation.en: [Eleanor] It sounds like you're right in my ear, whispering sweet nothings.
translation.zh:
感觉就好像你在我耳边
低语着甜蜜又无意义的话

translation.en: -It really does. -Resonance is better if I hold the mic--
translation.zh:
-不 我发现共鸣比较好
-真的

translation.en: -[cell phone beeping] -Excuse me, hold on.
translation.zh:
-如果我拿着麦克风…
-不好意思 等我一下

translation.en: -[Frank] Nothing serious? -Nothing serious.
translation.zh:
-不重要的事吗？
-不重要的事

translation.en: Let me ask you two questions. First question:
translation.zh:
我要先问你两个问题
第一 那是你男友发的吗？

translation.en: -Was that from your boyfriend? -I don't have a boyfriend.
translation.zh:
我要先问你两个问题
第一 那是你男友发的吗？ 我没有男友

translation.en: -Second question: You live near here? -About five minutes.
translation.zh:
-第二个问题 你住附近吗？
-大概五分钟的车程

translation.en: Wanna go there now?
translation.zh: 想要现在就离开吗？

translation.en: Why did you ask how far it was before you invited yourself back?
translation.zh:
你为什么要先问距离多远
才提议要离开？

translation.en: If it had been a bit further away, would that have been a deal breaker?
translation.zh: 如果再远一点的话就不行吗？

translation.en: Like, five minutes, "Yeah, sure."
translation.zh: 例如 五分钟的话就是“走吧”

translation.en: Half-hour, "Yeah, forget it, it's too much of a hassle."
translation.zh: 半小时就是“算了 太麻烦了”

translation.en: -No. Wait, what? -Forget it. Come on.
translation.zh:
-不是 等等 什么？
-没事 走吧

translation.en: Let's make a move so you don't waste too much time.
translation.zh: 我们走吧 这样就不用浪费时间了

translation.en: -Drink? -Yeah, sure.
translation.zh:
-喝一杯吗？
-好啊

translation.en: Thanks. Good night. It was fun.
translation.zh: 谢了 晚安 我很开心

translation.en: Do you want my number, or should I take yours?
translation.zh:
你要记一下我的电话
或是我应该记你的电话吗？

translation.en: I don't think so.
translation.zh: 不用了吧

translation.en: -You're married, right? -How did you know?
translation.zh:
-你结婚了吧？
-你怎么知道？

translation.en: Call it intuition, but not many women collect superhero toys.
translation.zh:
算是直觉吧 没多少女人会收集
超级英雄的玩具

translation.en: Apparently, they're not toys. They are "collectibles."
translation.zh: 显然那不是玩具 而是“收藏品”

translation.en: And you're the one saying I should leave at 2:30 in the morning.
translation.zh: 而且是你要我在凌晨两点半离开的

translation.en: I don't always do this sort of thing, you know?
translation.zh: 我不常做这种事的

translation.en: Hey, I'm not judging, I'm just...
translation.zh: 我没有批评的意思 我只是…

translation.en: And if you knew I was married, then you're as bad as me.
translation.zh:
如果你知道我已婚
那你就跟我一样糟糕

translation.en: Not really.
translation.zh: 才不会

translation.en: I didn't tell your husband I'd be faithful to him
translation.zh: 我可没有承诺你老公会对他忠诚

translation.en: and stand by him in sickness and health, blah, blah. -Again, not judging, just saying. -Wait, wait.
translation.zh:
支持他 但我要再次强调
我不是批评你 只是说说

translation.en: You don't know anything about me or my husband.
translation.zh: 等等 你对我或我丈夫根本一无所知

translation.en: Only that you were just unfaithful to him, and he doesn't know
translation.zh: 我只知道你对他不忠诚 而他不知道

translation.en: or you wouldn't be throwing me out and being defensive.
translation.zh:
否则你就不会把我赶出去
又防卫心这么重了

translation.en: Okay, marriage doesn't always turn out like you planned, okay?
translation.zh: 婚姻不会一直都像计划那样 好吗？

translation.en: I mean, he hasn't exactly fulfilled his promise.
translation.zh: 他也没有履行他的诺言啊

translation.en: I thought he'd be something big in entertainment by now
translation.zh:
我本来以为他现在在娱乐圈
会站有一席之地了

translation.en: and I'd be living in a mansion in Beverly Hills.
translation.zh: 我可以住在比佛利山庄的别墅里

translation.en: I'm pretty sure they drop that from the vows now.
translation.zh: 我想宣誓的时候应该没说这些吧

translation.en: As for throwing you out...
translation.zh: 至于把你赶出去？

translation.en: I just suggested that we exchange numbers, so...
translation.zh: 我只是提议交换号码而已 所以

translation.en: So we could do this again?
translation.zh: 所以我们能再来一次？

translation.en: I thought you didn't do this sort of thing all the time.
translation.zh: 我以为你不常做这种事呢

translation.en: -Fuck off. -Charming.
translation.zh:
-滚吧
-真有礼貌

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Yep, thanks. Frank!
translation.zh: 好 谢了 弗兰克

translation.en: Like ten percent bigger. Better for my cheekbones, right?
translation.zh:
再增大百分之十
对我的颧骨比较好吧？

translation.en: -[woman] Yeah. -See that?
translation.zh:
-对
-看到了吗？

translation.en: Can I get a word? Now is good.
translation.zh: 可以谈一下吗？最好现在

translation.en: Yep, have a seat.
translation.zh: 好 请坐

translation.en: Something's cooking in Ecuador. The intel's a little sketchy,
translation.zh: 厄瓜多尔有情况 情报有点粗略

translation.en: but it looks like an uprising could be underway.
translation.zh: 但看起来似乎要造反了

translation.en: Rebel troops amassing, reports of arms stockpiles, that kind of thing.
translation.zh:
叛军集结 据说在累积军火
诸如此类的

translation.en: They can't say exactly when it's gonna blow, but it's gonna.
translation.zh:
不知道什么时候会爆发
但是迟早的事

translation.en: -You interested? -I'm gone.
translation.zh:
-你有兴趣吗？
-我已经在路上了

translation.en: It's dangerous. Drug gangs ruling the streets. With guns.
translation.zh:
很危险 贩毒集团统治街头
手握武器

translation.en: Kidnapping tourists... journalists.
translation.zh: 绑架游客 记者

translation.en: Listen, if you're not feeling as brave as you pretend...
translation.zh:
听着 若你没有你装出来的那么勇敢
现在就让我知道

translation.en: -...tell me now. -[scoffs] When do I go?
translation.zh:
听着 若你没有你装出来的那么勇敢
现在就让我知道 -什么时候出发？
-今天下午

translation.en: This afternoon.
translation.zh:
-什么时候出发？
-今天下午

translation.en: -You wanna take Claire? -No.
translation.zh:
-你要带克莱尔一起吗？
-不

translation.en: Pointless having two journalists on the spot.
translation.zh: 没必要派两个记者去冒险

translation.en: Remember last time I was in Pakistan, I had transmission problems?
translation.zh:
记得我上次去巴基斯坦
遇到了通讯的问题吗？

translation.en: -I should take a technician. -All right.
translation.zh:
-我该带技术人员去
-好

translation.en: Let's see.
translation.zh: 我想想

translation.en: -Finch is available. -Fine.
translation.zh:
-芬奇有空
-好吧

translation.en: All right. Work it out with him. Let's go.
translation.zh: 好 去跟他说 走吧

translation.en: Marie, I need two tickets to Quito.
translation.zh: 玛瑞 我要两张飞基多的机票

translation.en: -You could stay here with us. -That would be a pleasure.
translation.zh:
-你可以待在这儿跟我们一起
-我们很乐意

translation.en: Thanks, guys.
translation.zh: 谢谢你们

translation.en: You're the closest thing to family I've got, if I'm honest.
translation.zh: 老实说你们真的很像我的家人

translation.en: I've always felt at home here.
translation.zh: 我在这里一直觉得就像回到家

translation.en: -Hoping it won't come to that. -You're coming to Ecuador with me.
translation.zh:
-希望不会真变成这样
-你要跟我一起去厄瓜多尔

translation.en: Get your passport to admin. They need details to clear entry papers.
translation.zh:
把护照交去行政部门
他们得处理入境文件

translation.en: -What, now? -Yeah, we're going this afternoon.
translation.zh:
-什么？现在吗？
-对 我们今天下午就要出发

translation.en: -No. I'd love to, but it's impossible. -Why? What's the problem?
translation.zh:
-我很乐意 但不可能
-为什么？怎么回事？

translation.en: My wife's left me.
translation.zh: 我老婆离开我了

translation.en: After the stakeout with Claire last night.
translation.zh: 昨晚跟克莱尔去盯哨之后

translation.en: I came home this morning and went to give her a hug
translation.zh: 我今早回到家 去抱了她一下

translation.en: and she just pushed...
translation.zh: 但她把我推开

translation.en: Said she needed some distance.
translation.zh: 说她需要一点距离

translation.en: Told me to leave her alone. Can you believe that?
translation.zh: 还要我别烦她 你能相信吗？

translation.en: Don't worry. It happens to all couples.
translation.zh: 别担心 所有夫妻都会发生这种事

translation.en: A week in Ecuador with me, it'll take your mind off things.
translation.zh:
跟我去厄瓜多尔一个星期
你就不会烦这件事了

translation.en: Thanks for the offer, but I'm gonna stay around and see if I can work it out.
translation.zh:
感谢你的提议 但我要留下
看看有没有什么办法

translation.en: These things are a sign. You need to move on, have an adventure.
translation.zh:
这是一个征兆
你需要向前看 去冒个险

translation.en: -I've written her a letter. -You've written a novel.
translation.zh:
-我写了一封信给她
-那根本是小说

translation.en: -I had a lot to say. -And on radio station paper? Romantic.
translation.zh:
-我感触良多
-用电台的信纸？还真浪漫

translation.en: I put a few photos in, as well. To remind her of the good times.
translation.zh:
我还放了几张照片进去
提醒她我们共度的好时光

translation.en: That's quite a package she's gonna receive.
translation.zh: 真是个了不起的包裹

translation.en: Actually, you're good with words. Can you have a look at it for me?
translation.zh: 你对文字很擅长 能帮我看一下吗？

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
translation.zh: 没问题

translation.en: -That's not how you spell "suicide." -Cheers.
translation.zh:
-“自杀”不是这样拼的
-谢了

translation.en: You know what? A country going through a rebel coup
translation.zh: 你知道吗？一个国家正经历叛军政变

translation.en: is no place to be crying over a wife who's left you.
translation.zh: 你没时间为了跑掉的老婆哭泣

translation.en: -You just need to move on. -That's funny.
translation.zh:
-你得继续向前
-有意思

translation.en: I'm playing a video game called Rebel Coup.
translation.zh: 我正在玩一个叫“叛军政变”的游戏

translation.en: Eleanor thinks it's childish, a grown man playing games.
translation.zh: 爱莲诺觉得成年男子打游戏很幼稚

translation.en: [sighs] I should've paid her more attention.
translation.zh: 我应该多关心她的

translation.en: But then, would I have achieved such a high score? Who knows?
translation.zh:
但这样我还能得那么高分吗？
谁知道呢？

translation.en: You know what? Maybe I'll ask someone else to come along.
translation.zh: 这样吧？或许我该找别人跟我一起去

translation.en: -Yeah. -Cheers.
translation.zh:
-对
-再见

translation.en: -How long you away for? -A week or two.
translation.zh:
-你要离开多久？
-一两周吧

translation.en: -Can I get an SM58 and a MIDI MkII? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-我要动圈麦克风和迷笛控制器
-好

translation.en: I've changed my mind. I'm coming.
translation.zh: 我改变主意了 我要去

translation.en: That way, my wife can stay in that empty apartment, all alone,
translation.zh:
这样我老婆就能一个人
待在空荡荡的公寓里

translation.en: and think of me, maybe even miss me.
translation.zh: 想着我 或许还会思念我

translation.en: -Great. -Are they bulletproof vests?
translation.zh:
-太好了
-这是防弹背心吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, they are. -What, for...?
translation.zh:
-对
-要干嘛？

translation.en: Why is the...?
translation.zh: 这是…

translation.en: Why are they...? Why do they end...? Have you got bulletproof pants?
translation.zh: 为什么…你们有防弹裤吗？

translation.en: Otherwise, what's the... point?
translation.zh: 不然 又有什么意义呢？

translation.en: Passports, entry papers and tickets.
translation.zh: 护照 入境文件和机票

translation.en: You have a United flight to Quito at 2 p.m. from Newark.
translation.zh:
你们搭联合航空的班机到基多
下午两点从诺瓦克飞

translation.en: -[Finch] Cheers. -Don't lose them.
translation.zh:
-谢了
-别弄丢了

translation.en: Why would I lose them?
translation.zh: 我怎么会弄丢？

translation.en: -I was just saying. -What, like I lost my wife?
translation.zh:
-我只是提醒一下
-因为我搞丢了老婆嘛？

translation.en: -[Claire] Do you have everything? -I think so.
translation.zh:
-该带的都带了吗？
-应该吧

translation.en: I wish I had one of those wheelie things now.
translation.zh: 真希望我也有可以拉的行李箱

translation.en: -Listen to me. -What?
translation.zh:
-听我说
-什么？

translation.en: When we get there, they're at war.
translation.zh: 我们到那里时 他们可是在打仗

translation.en: -I don't wanna be a babysitter, okay? -I won't let you down.
translation.zh:
-我不想当保姆 好吗？
-我不会让你失望的

translation.en: -What should I do with the letter? -Forget it.
translation.zh:
-信要怎么办？
-别管了

translation.en: -What do you mean? -Who's the man in this relationship, hmm?
translation.zh:
-什么意思？
-在这段关系中 谁才是男人？

translation.en: -Don't be a pussy. -[gasps] Sexist.
translation.zh:
-别一副娘炮样
-性别歧视

translation.en: -What? -Nothing.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-没事

translation.en: -Listen, you need to grow a pair. -Of breasts?
translation.zh:
-你得有一点…
-胸部吗？

translation.en: -Balls. -Oh, sorry. It's because you said "pair."
translation.zh:
-“种”！
-抱歉 因为你说有一点…

translation.en: Because I say "pair of breasts," but I don't say "pair of balls."
translation.zh:
我会说有一点胸部
我不会说有一点种 我只说“有种”

translation.en: -I just say "balls." -Throw the letter away.
translation.zh:
我会说有一点胸部
我不会说有一点种 我只说“有种” 把信扔了 让她猜你跑哪去了

translation.en: -Right. -Let her wonder where you are.
translation.zh: 把信扔了 让她猜你跑哪去了

translation.en: After a couple weeks, you won't wanna know her anymore.
translation.zh: 几周之后 你根本就懒得理她了

translation.en: Don't give me the "there's plenty more fish in the sea."
translation.zh: 别跟我说“天涯何处无芳草”那套

translation.en: I was gonna say there's plenty more women in the world.
translation.zh:
不 我本来是要说
世界上有那么多女人…

translation.en: -You seen Ecuadorian girls? -No. What are they like?
translation.zh:
-你见过厄瓜多尔的女人吗？
-没有 长怎样？

translation.en: They're like Spanish women, but different. With ponchos. You'll see.
translation.zh:
就跟西班牙女人一样 但不同
穿着斗篷 你到时就知道了

translation.en: Cheers. I'm sorry. They keep coming off.
translation.zh: 谢谢 抱歉 一直掉下来

translation.en: My problem is I've got slopy shoulders, so it's hard.
translation.zh:
我的问题是我肩膀太斜了
所以很难背

translation.en: [Claire] That is a problem.
translation.zh: 是很麻烦

translation.en: -Can we stop off at mine on the way? -What for?
translation.zh:
-可以顺路在我家停一下吗？
-为什么？

translation.en: I've hardly got any clothes. This is all equipment.
translation.zh: 因为我几乎没带衣服 这些都是设备

translation.en: Forget it, you can get some when we get to Quito. Come on.
translation.zh: 别管了 到基多再买就好了 走吧

translation.en: Be careful. Both of you, obviously.
translation.zh: 你们两个都要小心

translation.en: -It'll be dangerous. -Danger's my middle name.
translation.zh:
-很危险的
-我的中间名就是危险

translation.en: -Mine's Dennis. -[snickers]
translation.zh: 我的是丹尼斯

translation.en: -See you soon, then. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-再见
-好

translation.en: Cheers.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: [Eleanor] Hi, I'm not around. Leave a message.
translation.zh: 我不在 请留言

translation.en: Voicemail.
translation.zh: 语音信箱

translation.en: She obviously sees my number and she doesn't pick up
translation.zh: 她一定看到我的号码 然后不接

translation.en: because she doesn't wanna talk to me.
translation.zh: 因为她不想跟我说话

translation.en: Can I borrow your cell? She won't recognize the number.
translation.zh:
你的手机可以借我吗？
她不知道你的号码

translation.en: -I thought you'd let her sweat. -No, I know.
translation.zh:
-我以为你要让她紧张
-我知道

translation.en: But I was gonna let her know that we're going to Ecuador,
translation.zh: 但我本来想告诉她我们要去厄瓜多尔

translation.en: a war-torn country, sort of cool-like.
translation.zh: 一个很酷的战火频发的国家

translation.en: Yeah, no, you do cool great.
translation.zh: 你很冷静

translation.en: That's why I'm so confident having you as my only support
translation.zh:
所以我才很有信心
只带了你一个人当我的支援

translation.en: in a scary, dangerous, hostile place.
translation.zh:
就跑到一个恐怖 危险
充满敌意的地方

translation.en: It's like having my own John Wayne.
translation.zh: 就像我个人的约翰韦恩一样

translation.en: Listen to me, you bumbling little fool, we agreed,
translation.zh: 听我说 你这傻瓜 我们说好了

translation.en: your problems, they're your problems, not mine.
translation.zh: 你的问题就是你的问题 不是我的

translation.en: -Okay? -One, rude. Two...
translation.zh:
-好吗？
-第一 你真没礼貌 第二

translation.en: Okay, I'll just call her back on mine. Not a problem. Thanks for your help.
translation.zh:
我用我的手机打给她就好了
不客气 多谢帮忙

translation.en: [Eleanor] Hi, I'm not around. Leave a message. -[beeps] -[Finch] Hi, it's me.
translation.zh:
-我不在 请留言
-是我

translation.en: Listen, I'm off to Ecuador to cover a pretty dangerous war.
translation.zh:
那个…我要去厄瓜多尔报道
一场很危险的战争

translation.en: Um, we'll talk about everything when I get back. If I get back.
translation.zh:
等我回去 若我回得去
我们再好好谈谈

translation.en: It's cut out. Oh, it's the tunnel. Sorry, can you avoid the tunnels?
translation.zh: 没信号了 过隧道 抱歉 你可以避开隧道吗？

translation.en: Tickets.
translation.zh: 机票

translation.en: That's not the tickets, that's your letter.
translation.zh: 这不是机票 是你的情书

translation.en: -I threw the letter away. -No, you didn't. It's right there.
translation.zh:
-我把情书丢了
-没有 就在这呢

translation.en: What did I throw away, then?
translation.zh: 那我丢了什么？

translation.en: Don't tell me you threw away the passports!
translation.zh: 你把护照丢了！

translation.en: You said to throw away the letter, so I threw it in the truck.
translation.zh:
你说把情书丢了
所以我就丢在车上了

translation.en: -Which truck? -The garbage truck.
translation.zh:
-什么车
-垃圾车

translation.en: Because I must've mixed up the... Let's go back to the station,
translation.zh:
我一定是搞错了…
我们回电台去

translation.en: tell them we lost the tickets, get new tickets.
translation.zh:
告诉他们我们把机票弄丢了
要新的机票

translation.en: We'll come tomorrow. It's fine.
translation.zh: 明天再去 没关系的

translation.en: You threw away the passports, the tickets, and the cash?
translation.zh: 你把护照 机票和现金都丢了？

translation.en: Where are we gonna get new fucking passports from?
translation.zh: 我们要去哪弄新护照？

translation.en: -In one day! In one day! -What else are we gonna do?
translation.zh:
-在一天之内 一天之内！
-那不然要怎么办？

translation.en: -Unbelievable. -I didn't do it on purpose.
translation.zh:
-难以置信
-我又不是故意的

translation.en: You're a stupid, worthless, idiotic,
translation.zh: 你是个愚蠢 没用 白痴

translation.en: -incompetent piece of shit. You know that? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-又无能的混蛋 你知道吗？
-知道

translation.en: -What? -Yes, I do know that.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-我知道

translation.en: Fuck. Taxi!
translation.zh: 操 出租车！

translation.en: Yes, it's Finch and Frank! Hi! How was Ecuador?
translation.zh:
对 是芬奇和弗兰克！
你们好 厄瓜多尔怎么样？

translation.en: Shh! What? Is anyone from the radio station in there?
translation.zh: 有电台的人在里面吗？

translation.en: -No. Why? -I'll explain later. Get in. Get in.
translation.zh:
-没有 怎么了？
-我等等再解释 进去 进去

translation.en: -[Brigida] Get in. Get in. -[Finch] Oh, God.
translation.zh:
-进去
-老天

translation.en: -[Domingo] That's quite a story. -It is.
translation.zh:
-真精彩
-确实

translation.en: We need to work out what we're gonna do.
translation.zh: 我们得想想该怎么做

translation.en: -We need to brainstorm. -Brainstorm.
translation.zh:
-要集思广益一下
-集思广益

translation.en: Brainstorm.
translation.zh: 集思广益

translation.en: -What is a "brainstorm"? -I love these two to bits
translation.zh:
-什么是“集思广益”？
-我很喜欢他们两个

translation.en: but they're not the sharpest tool in the box.
translation.zh: 但他们两个脑袋不太灵光

translation.en: Whereas you're a genius?
translation.zh: 而你就是天才咯？

translation.en: Either of you ever thrown away your passports on the way to the airport?
translation.zh: 你有在到机场路上把护照丢过吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -[Domingo] Okay.
translation.zh:
-有
-好吧

translation.en: [Brigida] Brainstorm.
translation.zh: 集思广益

translation.en: Could two other people go instead of you?
translation.zh: 可以找另外两个人代替你们吗？

translation.en: -What? Of course not. -[Brigida] Can you go somewhere else?
translation.zh:
-什么？当然不行
-你们可以去别的地方吗？

translation.en: -No. The story I'm covering is in Ecuador. -Oh, okay.
translation.zh:
-不行 我要做的报道在厄瓜多尔
-好吧

translation.en: Can you cover a different story?
translation.zh: 你们可以报道不同的新闻吗？

translation.en: No. It needs to be that story, it needs to be Ecuador and it needs to be us.
translation.zh:
不行 一定要是那一则新闻
一定要是厄瓜多尔 还得是我们

translation.en: And we haven't got passports.
translation.zh: 而且我们没有护照

translation.en: -I got it. -Go on.
translation.zh:
-我想到了
-说吧

translation.en: You can use someone else's passports.
translation.zh: 你们可以用别人的护照

translation.en: -Ours. -Oh, we're screwed.
translation.zh:
-用我们的
-我们死定了

translation.en: -No, but she's... and we're-- -[Brigida] Okay, um...
translation.zh: 不 但她…

translation.en: You can save up money for new tickets, and by then, the passports will be here.
translation.zh:
你们可以存钱买新机票
到那时护照也补发下来了

translation.en: And the war will be over.
translation.zh: 那战争也结束了

translation.en: -[Domingo] That's good then. -Not for us.
translation.zh:
-那很好啊
-对我们来说不好

translation.en: No, but for the people. Less will die.
translation.zh: 但对当地人好 不会死那么多人

translation.en: -[Brigida] Less will die. -They're thinking of the people.
translation.zh:
-不会死那么多人
-他们是为人民着想

translation.en: -Less will die. -You'll die, though. I'll kill you. Look...
translation.zh:
-不会死那么多人
-你还是会死 我要杀了你

translation.en: Let's go over and explain. Maybe Mallard won't fire us.
translation.zh:
我们回去解释一下
或许马拉德不会开除我们

translation.en: He'll fire you when I tell him how fuckin' useless you are.
translation.zh:
他会开除你 我会告诉他
你有多他妈的没用

translation.en: -Language. -[Frank] Oh, my God. He's gonna think that I chickened out, that I didn't have the guts to go.
translation.zh: 他会认为我胆怯了 认为我没种去

translation.en: That'll give him the perfect excuse to fire me.
translation.zh: 这样他也有借口开除我

translation.en: I'm gonna have to kill him. I'll go to jail.
translation.zh: 我得杀了他 这样就得坐牢

translation.en: I'll get out of jail, and then I'll kill you. So, let's not do that.
translation.zh:
然后等我出狱后 我就要杀了你
所以不要这么做比较好

translation.en: -Think! -Okay.
translation.zh:
-好好思考
-好

translation.en: They're expecting a report from us at 10:00, from Ecuador,
translation.zh:
我们应该要在十点时
从厄瓜多尔进行报道的

translation.en: and there's no way we can get there.
translation.zh: 但我们不可能及时赶到

translation.en: We don't need to get there. They're expecting a report from Ecuador.
translation.zh:
我们不用到那里去
他们要我们在厄瓜多尔报道

translation.en: Let's give them one on a cell phone.
translation.zh: 我们就用手机报道吧

translation.en: The same number would show whether we were in London, New York or Quito.
translation.zh:
不管你在伦敦 纽约或基多
都是一样的号码

translation.en: -I can create a soundscape. A war zone. -It'll never work.
translation.zh:
-我可以创造战区的背景音效
-不可能成功的

translation.en: It will work. It will work. Can I use your spare room?
translation.zh:
可以的
我可以用你们的客房吗？

translation.en: -Brainstorm. -Brainstorm.
translation.zh:
-集思广益
-集思广益

translation.en: -[Brigida] Come in. Come in. Welcome. -[Domingo] Right this way.
translation.zh:
-请进…
-这边请

translation.en: Must be great, living right above the restaurant.
translation.zh: 住在餐厅楼上一定很棒吧

translation.en: -Never late for work. -[Brigida] Oh, we are.
translation.zh:
-上班都不会迟到
-会的

translation.en: -Really? -Oh, yeah, all the time.
translation.zh:
-真的？
-对啊 一天到晚

translation.en: -Sure. -[Brigida] Come in, up the stairs.
translation.zh:
-当然
-请进 在楼上

translation.en: More stairs.
translation.zh: 还有楼梯

translation.en: Excellent.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Give me half an hour.
translation.zh: 给我半小时

translation.en: Cheers, guys. All right.
translation.zh: 谢了 好

translation.en: [Frank] We meant to go to Ecuador.
translation.zh: 我们本来该去厄瓜多尔的

translation.en: We got as far as an apartment on top of a restaurant
translation.zh: 但我们只到了一间公寓 在餐厅楼上 而且就在电台对面

translation.en: across the road from the radio station.
translation.zh: 在餐厅楼上 而且就在电台对面

translation.en: -You don't like it? -Oh, no, it's lovely.
translation.zh:
-你不喜欢这里？
-不 这里很棒

translation.en: [stammers] That's not what I meant. I...
translation.zh: 我不是那个意思

translation.en: No, it's fine. It's just... you know.
translation.zh: 这很好 只是…你知道

translation.en: You know Kim and Kanye?
translation.zh: 你认识金和肯伊吗？

translation.en: No. No, I don't.
translation.zh: 我不认识

translation.en: Beyoncé? Jay Z? They are your friends?
translation.zh: 碧昂丝和杰斯呢？你们是朋友吗？

translation.en: Friends? No. Not friends.
translation.zh: 朋友？我们不是朋友

translation.en: -The Jonas Brothers? -Jonas Brothers.
translation.zh:
-那乔纳斯兄弟呢？
-乔纳斯兄弟

translation.en: I don't know the Jonas Brothers.
translation.zh: 我不认识乔纳斯兄弟

translation.en: You want to read about Honey Boo Boo child?
translation.zh: 你要读甜心波波的报道吗？

translation.en: -I don't know what he wants. -Okay, come on up, guys.
translation.zh:
-我不知道他想怎样
-好 你们上来吧

translation.en: Okay, close your eyes. Ready?
translation.zh: 把眼睛闭上 准备好了吗？

translation.en: Beautiful rain forest.
translation.zh: 美丽的雨林

translation.en: Birds.
translation.zh: 鸟叫

translation.en: -There's monkeys. Parrots. -[animal noises]
translation.zh: 猴子 鹦鹉

translation.en: -Hold on. Here comes a tank. -[tracks rumbling]
translation.zh: 等等 坦克来了

translation.en: Oh. Machine-gun fire. Airplanes.
translation.zh: 机关枪发射 飞机

translation.en: A helicopter hovers overhead. Oh. Explosions.
translation.zh: 头顶有直升机盘旋 爆炸

translation.en: Hand grenades.
translation.zh: 手榴弹

translation.en: Welcome to Ecuador.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到厄瓜多尔

translation.en: The government's just closed the borders.
translation.zh: 政府刚关闭边境

translation.en: The information just came from the Secretary of State's office.
translation.zh: 这是国务院那边传来的消息

translation.en: There may have been a sarin gas warning.
translation.zh: 说可能有沙林毒气

translation.en: [Virginia] Yeah, the dispatch just came in.
translation.zh: 对 调派中心刚有消息来

translation.en: Okay. I'm gonna call in, if you're ready.
translation.zh: 你准备好的话 我要打进去了

translation.en: So, guys, shout out some stuff in the background, add to the atmosphere.
translation.zh: 你们在后面大喊一下 增加一点气氛

translation.en: -What should we say? -Anything. Spanish.
translation.zh:
-我们要说什么？
-都行 要西班牙文

translation.en: -[phone rings] -It's Frank.
translation.zh: 是弗兰克

translation.en: -Frank, where are you now? -I'm in Quito.
translation.zh:
-弗兰克 你在哪？
-我在基多

translation.en: -You managed to get through? -Yeah. Why?
translation.zh:
-你混进去了？
-对 怎么了？

translation.en: They've closed the borders. There was a sarin gas warning.
translation.zh: 边境关闭了 听说有沙林毒气

translation.en: You know what? Stay on the line. Let me put you through to the studio.
translation.zh:
这样吧 保持通讯
我把你接到录音室

translation.en: I want you to sell Bonneville as an exclusive. Hold on.
translation.zh:
我要你宣布邦尼维尔有独家新闻
等等

translation.en: -[upbeat intro music plays] -[announcer] Q365.
Our reporter, Frank Bonneville, who managed to get into Ecuador
translation.zh:
我们的记者 弗兰克邦尼维尔
在边境关闭前

translation.en: before the borders were closed, has an exclusive for Q365 News.
translation.zh:
想办法进入了厄瓜多尔
并为Q365新闻带来了独家报道

translation.en: Live from Ecuador, he will now give us the first account of this latest development.
translation.zh:
来自厄瓜多尔的直播 他将告诉我们
最新进展的第一手消息

translation.en: -Frank. -[Frank] In Quito,
translation.zh:
-弗兰克
-在基多

translation.en: the man on the street doesn't know that tomorrow, in addition to the gunfire
translation.zh: 街头上的人们看不到明天 除了交火和冷漠无情的攻击

translation.en: -and indiscriminate attacks... -[gunfire]
translation.zh: 除了交火和冷漠无情的攻击

translation.en: ...the threat of chemical war looms over the city.
translation.zh:
整个城市也垄罩在
化学武器的威胁之下

translation.en: However, the sudden closure of the border
translation.zh: 然而 边境突然关闭

translation.en: confirms the seriousness of the situation.
translation.zh: 更证实了情况有多危急

translation.en: Real Madrid! -[Domingo shouts indistinctly] -[war sounds continue]
translation.zh: 皇家马德里队

translation.en: And this is a new threat the government could really have done without, Frank?
translation.zh:
这是政府绝不能忽视的威胁吧？
弗兰克

translation.en: [Frank] My thoughts exactly. For the last three days,
translation.zh: 我也是这么想 过去三天来

translation.en: they've been fighting an enemy that no bomb can possibly destroy.
translation.zh:
他们都在和
炸弹也无法摧毁的敌军作战

translation.en: -Sand. -Julio Iglesias! -[gasps] -[muffled noise]
translation.zh:
-沙
-胡里奥伊格莱西亚斯

translation.en: Raised in squalls by the shrieking, violent wind,
translation.zh: 呼啸的狂风和沙暴

translation.en: the desert sand has brought the city to a standstill.
translation.zh: 呼啸的狂风和沙暴 使这座城市陷入僵局

translation.en: The men and their targeting instruments are blind.
translation.zh: 军队和瞄准工具都失效了

translation.en: The air force is grounded.
translation.zh: 空军也无法升空

translation.en: The sky has changed color. The temperature has dropped.
translation.zh: 天空变了颜色 气温骤降

translation.en: The sun has all but disappeared, leaving the locals,
translation.zh: 太阳也消失无踪 让当地人

translation.en: the innocent victims in this bloody infighting, to wonder:
translation.zh: 无辜的受害者在这场内战中 思忖着

translation.en: what has happened to the world they once knew?
translation.zh: 这个他们曾熟知的世界到底怎么了？

translation.en: This is Frank Bonneville, live from Quito.
translation.zh:
我是弗兰克邦尼维尔
来自基多的报道

translation.en: Okay, good. But I think we need more information.
translation.zh: 好 很好 我想我们需要更多信息

translation.en: Because I'm pretty sure sand isn't a big problem in Ecuador.
translation.zh:
因为我很确定沙在厄瓜多尔
不会是什么大问题

translation.en: I think it's quite lush and rain-foresty and... -banana plants and things. -Okay.
translation.zh:
我觉得那里应该很多植物 雨林
还有香蕉树什么的

translation.en: And also, guys, imagine you're in your village.
translation.zh: 还有你们想象自己在村庄里

translation.en: Aah! What might you shout?
translation.zh: 你们可能会大喊什么？

translation.en: -What does that mean? -Uncle Miguel!
translation.zh:
-什么意思？
-米盖尔叔叔

translation.en: -Why would you shout "Uncle Miguel"? -Because he's almost deaf.
translation.zh:
-你为什么要大喊“米盖尔叔叔”？
-因为他差不多聋了

translation.en: Be scared. Shout something about your children.
translation.zh: 要害怕一点 喊一点跟你小孩有关的

translation.en: -What does that mean? -My baby is getting fat!
translation.zh:
-什么意思？
-我的宝宝变胖了

translation.en: -What's that got to do with anything? -Because you say:
translation.zh:
-这根本无关！
-因为你说

translation.en: "Say something about children," and I love fat babies
translation.zh:
“喊一点跟你小孩有关的”
我喜欢胖宝宝

translation.en: -because it means they're eating well. -[Finch] Yeah.
translation.zh:
-因为这表示他们吃得好
-对

translation.en: -It's true. -I know, I like fat babies.
translation.zh:
-真的
-我知道 我也喜欢胖宝宝

translation.en: What happened to the TV?
translation.zh: 电视怎么了？

translation.en: The fact of the matter is that the face of poverty, no matter where you are,
translation.zh:
事实上 不管你身在何方
贫穷者的脸庞

translation.en: -is always the same. -Look at this guy, Baker.
translation.zh:
-都是一样的
-看看这家伙 贝克

translation.en: There's a guy that can fake something. He's got a bulletproof vest on,
translation.zh: 这家伙才能造假 他穿着防弹背心

translation.en: -he's 50 feet from the hotel. -How do you know where he is?
translation.zh:
-离旅馆只有十五米
-你怎么知道他在哪？

translation.en: Because of that fountain. I saw it from my room last time I was there.
translation.zh:
因为我上次去的时候
从房间就能看到那个喷泉

translation.en: No one knows. I think we're so much better off here-- Thank you. --than Ecuador.
translation.zh:
没人知道 我觉得我们在这儿…
谢谢 比在厄瓜多尔更好

translation.en: We've got wine, snacks. We're not being shot at.
translation.zh: 我们有酒 点心 又不会被枪射中

translation.en: You two make a good team.
translation.zh: 你们两个真是合作无间

translation.en: First time we've worked together, officially.
translation.zh: 这是我们第一次正式合作

translation.en: On something big, like this. Yeah.
translation.zh:
-这么大的案子
-是啊

translation.en: -His forte is sports. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-他专攻运动
-对

translation.en: -How many Tours de France have you done? -Twenty-five.
translation.zh:
-你报道过几次环法自行车赛？
-25次

translation.en: -In France? -Nah, didn't go there.
translation.zh:
-在法国？
-我没有去

translation.en: I sort of ran it from here, to make sure it all went smoothly.
translation.zh:
我基本上都在这里进行工作
确保一切顺利

translation.en: And the Olympics? You've done a few of those, too, right?
translation.zh: 那奥运呢？你也报道过几次吧？

translation.en: Just four. But they are only every four years, so, not bad.
translation.zh:
只有四次 但四年才办一次
所以还算不错

translation.en: -Where did you go? Beijing? -I didn't get to Beijing, no.
translation.zh:
-你去了哪？北京？
-我没去北京 没有

translation.en: -No, you did those from here, too, right? -Yes. Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你也是在这里制作吧？
-没错

translation.en: -So, have you actually been anywhere? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-所以你有真正去过哪儿吗？
-有

translation.en: -England. -No, you're from England.
translation.zh:
-英国
-不 你就是英国来的

translation.en: -That doesn't count. -Yeah. Okay.
translation.zh:
-不算
-好吧

translation.en: -Here, then. -Anywhere other than here.
translation.zh:
-那这里
-这里以外的地方呢？

translation.en: -England. -Wow.
translation.zh: 英国

translation.en: [Finch] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Every two-bit hack in New York got into Ecuador before they closed the border.
translation.zh:
纽约每个小记者都在边境封锁前
进到了厄瓜多尔

translation.en: -I need something special. -We got some great stuff.
translation.zh:
-我要一点特别的
-我们有很棒的内容

translation.en: -We got some exclusive stuff. -You still in Quito?
translation.zh:
-有独家报道
-你们还在基多？

translation.en: Are we still in Quito? No, we're in...
translation.zh: 我们还在基多吗？不 我们在…

translation.en: We're in the south, we're in a place called... Machala.
translation.zh: 我们在南方 在一个叫马恰拉的地方

translation.en: We thought it'd be good to get in amongst the people.
translation.zh: 我们觉得应该要打入人群之中

translation.en: Good. Yeah, yeah, give them something personal.
translation.zh: 好 很好 挖一些私人的消息

translation.en: That always gets them. All right, you're on in five.
translation.zh: 总是能感动观众 好 再过五秒播出

translation.en: And now, we go live to our special correspondent in Quito, Frank Bonneville.
translation.zh:
现在要和基多的特派员
弗兰克邦尼维尔连线

translation.en: The villagers could've left Sergeant Miguel to die.
translation.zh: 村民本来可以看着米盖尔中士死去

translation.en: But they chose to save the man.
translation.zh: 但他们选择救他一命

translation.en: A man, who, minutes earlier with his fellow troops,
translation.zh: 几分钟前 这个人和他的军队

translation.en: had been showering the area with fire and steel.
translation.zh: 才用枪炮要血洗了这地方

translation.en: This place might be a rebel stronghold, but these are kind people.
translation.zh:
这地方或许是叛军的地盘
但这些人都是好人

translation.en: It's simply not in their nature to let a man die on their land.
translation.zh:
他们无法坐视不管
让这个人死在他们的土地上

translation.en: -Whoever they are. -Oh, shit! Ooh. I'm sorry, I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
-不管他们是谁
-妈的 对不起 对不起

translation.en: Earlier today, I watched as a woman from the village
translation.zh: 今天稍早 我看着一个村庄的妇女

translation.en: desperately tried to save her own child,
translation.zh: 绝望地想拯救自己的孩子

translation.en: feverishly wiping the blood off the pavement
translation.zh: 她疯狂地擦拭着地板上的血

translation.en: as if that would somehow bring him back.
translation.zh: 好像这样能让他复活似的

translation.en: A peasant, a fat, sweaty peasant, looked on,
translation.zh:
一位农民 一位满身大汗的胖农夫
在一旁无助绝望地看着

translation.en: useless, hopeless, worthless even, knowing that nothing he ever did
translation.zh:
一位农民 一位满身大汗的胖农夫
在一旁无助绝望地看着 甚至可说他是毫无价值的
他知道自己根本

translation.en: could possibly do any good.
translation.zh: 做不了任何有用的事

translation.en: This is Frank Bonneville, live from Machala.
translation.zh:
我是弗兰克邦尼维尔
在马恰拉的报道

translation.en: -Good work. -You're on again at 7:00, call back.
translation.zh:
-干得好
-你七点要再次播出 到时打来

translation.en: -That's why he's the best. -I hope they're being careful.
translation.zh:
-所以他才这么厉害
-我希望他们小心一点

translation.en: [Finch] Well, we got away with it again.
translation.zh: 我们又逃过一劫了

translation.en: Looks like we made quite an impact.
translation.zh: 看来我们造成了不少冲击

translation.en: -I'm not sure about this. -We can't stay in the apartment all day.
translation.zh:
-我不知道
-我们不能整天都待在这公寓里

translation.en: We need some fresh air, some exercise.
translation.zh: 我们需要一些新鲜空气和运动

translation.en: I know, but what if we're spotted? Game over, isn't it?
translation.zh:
我知道 但如果被发现怎么办？
就玩完了吧？

translation.en: Oh, wow. Look. Oh. Amazing Spider-Man 14.
translation.zh: 你看 《超凡蜘蛛侠 14》

translation.en: I collect comics, so I know that's a good one.
translation.zh: 我搜集漫画 所以我知道这是好东西

translation.en: Yeah, we really should get back. Come on.
translation.zh: 我们真的该回去了 走吧

translation.en: -It's Mallard. -Shit. Don't answer it.
translation.zh:
-是马拉德
-该死 不要接

translation.en: I've gotta answer it. Hi.
translation.zh: 我不接不行 你好

translation.en: It's Finch. He's in the toilet. Yeah.
translation.zh: 我是芬奇 他在厕所 对

translation.en: I don't know where we are, exactly. It's all written in Spanish, obviously.
translation.zh:
我其实不知道我们在哪
这里都是西班牙文 刚刚的声音是地铁

translation.en: -So... That's the subway. -[subway rumbling]
translation.zh: 刚刚的声音是地铁

translation.en: That's what we call the trucks that drive the tanks.
translation.zh: 我们都是这么称呼载着坦克的卡车

translation.en: Yeah, because it sounds like the subway. Okay, yeah, I'll let him know.
translation.zh:
对 因为听起来像地铁
好 我会告诉他

translation.en: -He wants you to do a report at 1:00. -Shit.
translation.zh:
-他要你在一点钟报道
-妈的

translation.en: -He's onto us, man. -He's--
translation.zh:
-他起疑心了
-他…

translation.en: Hi. Yeah, he's out. Okay, hold on.
translation.zh: 你好 对 他出来了 好 等等

translation.en: -Hello? -I just need a 60-second update, Frank,
translation.zh:
-喂？
-我需要一个60秒的更新 弗兰克

translation.en: and then, uh, we'll trail something bigger.
translation.zh: 然后再报更重要的

translation.en: -Here? -What do you mean, "Here"?
translation.zh:
-在这儿？
-什么叫“在这儿”？

translation.en: -I mean, now? -Yes, yes. We're transferring you.
translation.zh:
-我是说 现在？
-对 我们正在转接

translation.en: [man] Now we go live to Frank Bonneville in Ecuador.
translation.zh:
我们要和在厄瓜多尔的
弗兰克邦尼维尔现场连线

translation.en: A cloud of dust rises into the horizon.
translation.zh: 地平线上升起一团云雾

translation.en: The silence is broken by the caterpillar tracks of two rogue tanks...
translation.zh: 坦克车的两条履带打破了宁静

translation.en: ...whose tracks are biting into the dust on the remote road.
translation.zh: 履带在偏远的道路上留下了痕迹

translation.en: A helicopter hovers overhead.
translation.zh: 头顶上有直升机盘旋

translation.en: -Is this Dr. Schmalzstein's office? -No. Shh.
translation.zh: 这是舒默斯金医生的诊所吗？

translation.en: In the bombed-out remains of what was once his home,
translation.zh: 在一个被炸弹夷为平地的住家

translation.en: a young boy watches television. -[man] Blow it out your ass! -[horn honking]
translation.zh:
-一名少年在看着电视
-把你屁股炸飞

translation.en: American television. Shells are incoming.
translation.zh: 美国电视节目 导弹射来

translation.en: My technician is hit by shrapnel. Oh, no, he's fine.
translation.zh:
我的技术人员被流弹击中了
不 他没事

translation.en: But we gotta get out of here. Fast.
translation.zh: 但我们得尽快离开这

translation.en: It's quiet. Too quiet, if anything.
translation.zh: 安静 要我说的话 这里太安静了

translation.en: In the sky, a combat helicopter stops. An explosion rings out.
translation.zh:
天空中的战斗直升机停了下来
爆炸刚结束

translation.en: My own technician has another near miss.
translation.zh: 我的技术人员刚死里逃生

translation.en: A bullet flies inches above his head.
translation.zh: 一颗子弹从他头顶上几公分处飞过

translation.en: Luckily for him, he's so short, or he'd most certainly be dead by now.
translation.zh: 好在他很矮 否则绝对死定了

translation.en: This is Frank Bonneville, Q365 News.
translation.zh: 我是Q365新闻的弗兰克邦尼维尔

translation.en: [man]Coming up at 7:00, we will have another exclusive from Frank Bonneville.
translation.zh:
接下来在七点钟
将有弗兰克邦尼维尔带来的独家报道

translation.en: That was too close for comfort. We can't get caught out like this again.
translation.zh:
这样太危险
我们不能再这样被突袭了

translation.en: We've gotta plan this, be in control. And we need something new.
translation.zh:
我们得好好计划 掌握主动权
现在我们需要新闻

translation.en: When Mallard first asked you to go to Ecuador, what did he say, exactly?
translation.zh:
当马拉德一开始
临时要你到厄瓜多尔时 他到底是怎么说的？

translation.en: Just that the rebel forces were amassing arms, weapons.
translation.zh: 说叛军正在累积军火 武器

translation.en: -What else? -Conjecture, rumors.
translation.zh:
-还有吗？
-还有些传闻 谣言

translation.en: [sighs] That's enough for you, though, isn't it? Anything that sells news.
translation.zh:
但这样对你来说就够了吧？
只要能卖新闻就好

translation.en: -Well, if people weren't so gullible... -That's it.
translation.zh:
-如果大家不是这么好骗…
-就是这个

translation.en: -What? -We start a rumor.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-我们来散布谣言

translation.en: One that can't be proved wrong. We invent someone, someone behind all this.
translation.zh:
一个无法被证明为非的谣言
我们编造一个人 一个幕后主使者

translation.en: And when people say, "Oh, we can't find this guy, who is he?"
translation.zh:
当大家说“我们找不到这个人
他是谁？”的时候

translation.en: "Well, no, of course you can't find him. He's elusive. He's an evil genius.
translation.zh:
大家当然找不到
因为他很神秘 他是个邪恶天才

translation.en: He's protected by a loyal army. He can work for anyone.
translation.zh:
他有一支忠诚的军队保护
他可以为任何人工作

translation.en: Be funded by anyone."
translation.zh: 只要出钱就好

translation.en: They'll just deny it, though, won't they?
translation.zh: 但他们会否认吧？

translation.en: So, the headline would read "So-and-so denies funding terrorists."
translation.zh:
头条会是
“某某否认出资援助恐怖份子”

translation.en: -Great. -That's unethical, though.
translation.zh:
-太好了
-但完全没职业道德

translation.en: Yeah, but it's news. What's a popular Spanish name?
translation.zh:
对 但是这是新闻
最热门的西班牙文名字是什么？

translation.en: Alvarez. Santiago. Emilio.
translation.zh: 阿瓦雷斯 圣地亚哥 埃米里欧

translation.en: [Frank] The man is Emilio Santiago Alvarez,
translation.zh:
那个人就叫
埃米里欧圣地亚哥阿瓦雷斯

translation.en: the instigator of the attacks against government forces in Ecuador.
translation.zh: 煽动对厄瓜多尔政府军发动攻击的人

translation.en: A small man, with no profile, no international presence.
translation.zh:
一个小人物 没有背景
在国际上没有名望

translation.en: But here, in the jungles and towns of southern Ecuador,
translation.zh:
但在这里
在南厄瓜多尔的丛林和市镇

translation.en: he's become a folk hero...
translation.zh: 他已成为了民族英雄

translation.en: a man unafraid to stand up and be counted.
translation.zh: 一个勇于站出来 可靠的人

translation.en: But on the street, rumors persist that Alvarez may not be working alone.
translation.zh:
但街头谣言纷纷
说阿瓦雷斯并非独自作战

translation.en: His rebel forces are too well equipped, too well trained, too well fed.
translation.zh:
他的叛军装备太好
受训太精良 也吃得太好

translation.en: It's said, and I must stress at this point, these rumors are uncorroborated...
translation.zh:
据说 我现在得特别强调
这些谣言并未经过证实

translation.en: that maybe Alvarez has friends in high places.
translation.zh: 或许阿瓦雷斯有位高权重的朋友

translation.en: Perhaps a little too close to home.
translation.zh: 或许离我们的国家太近了点

translation.en: Jesus, is he saying that the rebel forces are being funded by the U.S.?
translation.zh:
老天 他是在说叛军是由
美国出资支持的吗？

translation.en: [Frank] This is Frank Bonneville, Q365 News. [Mallard] That's huge.
translation.zh:
-Q365新闻的弗兰克邦尼维尔
-这可是大新闻

translation.en: Good one. Couldn't have done better myself.
translation.zh: 厉害 连我也做不到

translation.en: -We can keep this going for ages. -Yeah, let's see if they buy it first.
translation.zh:
-我们可以继续这样下去
-先看看他们买不买帐

translation.en: -They will. -[gunfire on video game]
translation.zh: 他们会的

translation.en: They will.
translation.zh: 他们会的

translation.en: [Secretary of State] Does Bonneville realize the mess he's made
translation.zh: 邦尼维尔知道他报道

translation.en: by allowing speculation that this Alvarez is working for the Americans?
translation.zh:
阿瓦雷斯为美国政府工作的这种揣测
惹了多大麻烦吗？

translation.en: Most probably, Madam Secretary.
translation.zh: 应该知道 国务卿女士

translation.en: Goddamn it. Why have we not heard of this man before? Where's your intelligence?
translation.zh:
该死的 我们为何之前没听过这个人
你的情报在哪？

translation.en: Our agents in Ecuador are tracing him now.
translation.zh:
我们在厄瓜多尔的探员
已经在追踪他了

translation.en: It's a good chance they know him by another name. A nickname.
translation.zh: 他很有可能有别的化名或昵称

translation.en: And if they don't find him, government forces will.
translation.zh: 若他们找不到他 政府军也会

translation.en: They're now looking for Bonneville to make him confess his sources.
translation.zh:
他们现在在找邦尼维尔
要他供出消息来源

translation.en: And Alvarez's men are after him because he revealed too much.
translation.zh:
阿瓦雷斯的人也会找他
因为他透露太多了

translation.en: He and his technician are in serious danger.
translation.zh: 他和他的技术人员都很危险

translation.en: I do not wanna end up with two dead citizens nor the wrath of their families.
translation.zh:
我可不想最后死了两个平民
还要面对家属的愤怒

translation.en: You are going to tell Finch and Bonneville to get to the American embassy in Quito
translation.zh:
你去叫芬奇和邦尼维尔
到在基多的美国大使馆

translation.en: as soon as possible. We need to know they're safe.
translation.zh: 要尽快 我们得确保他们的安全

translation.en: Once they're safe, we will extract them.
translation.zh: 等他们脱险 我们就会撤离他们

translation.en: That is something we know how to do.
translation.zh: 我们知道该怎么做

translation.en: Little is known about the mastermind behind the uprising,
translation.zh: 现在对于造反背后的主脑所知甚少

translation.en: rebel fighter Emilio Alvarez.
translation.zh: （新闻 基多最新消息） 叛军战士埃米里欧阿瓦雷斯

translation.en: The charismatic leader of the Ecuadorian Liberation Front
translation.zh: 厄瓜多尔解放阵线的迷人领袖… （实时新闻 世界新闻）

translation.en: is believed to come from humble beginnings.
translation.zh: 据信出身微贱

translation.en: The son of an unemployed,
translation.zh: 他父亲是个无业者

translation.en: left-wing atheist father and an unmarried mother with Communist sympathies.
translation.zh:
（真的假的？真相 厄瓜多尔造反） 左翼的无神论者和同情共产主义的
母亲并未结婚

translation.en: So, in your view, Alvarez has been quietly amassing a force for some time now.
translation.zh:
所以就你来看 阿瓦雷斯已经筹备了
一段时间的武力

translation.en: What I'm hearing from my sources is that Alvarez has risen
translation.zh:
我的消息来源告诉我
阿瓦雷斯几年来

translation.en: to a position of power in the Ecuadorian Liberation Front for some years.
translation.zh:
已经在厄瓜多尔解放阵线中
爬升到了极有权势的地位

translation.en: I always knew he made up most of the shit he reported.
translation.zh:
我一直就知道他报道的内容
大多都是乱编的

translation.en: So, why haven't we heard of him before?
translation.zh: 为何我们之前都没听说过他？

translation.en: -Well, it makes perfect sense. -How is he keeping a straight face?
translation.zh:
-这也不无道理…
-他是怎么装得一本正经的样子？

translation.en: ...less chance for the opposition of targeting you.
translation.zh: 敌人会锁定你

translation.en: Successful revolution is all about protecting your leaders.
translation.zh: 成功的革命就是要保护领导人

translation.en: So, Frank Bonneville has gone where no other news reporter has gone before
translation.zh:
所以弗兰克邦尼维尔做到了
其他新闻记者都没做到的

translation.en: in bringing this man to the public's attention.
translation.zh: 让大众注意到这个人

translation.en: -I wouldn't say that. -[cackling]
translation.zh: 我不这么认为

translation.en: I've known about Alvarez myself for a while now.
translation.zh:
我本人得知阿瓦雷斯的消息
已经有一阵子了

translation.en: I just didn't think it was appropriate to unmask him yet.
translation.zh: 我只是不觉得该把他报道出来

translation.en: [Finch] Oh, come on.
translation.zh: 拜托

translation.en: Hello? Yeah.
translation.zh: 喂？对

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, sure.
translation.zh: 好 没问题

translation.en: Yeah, I'll call you as soon as we get to Quito.
translation.zh: 好 我们到基多会马上打给你

translation.en: Okay, thanks.
translation.zh: 好 谢了

translation.en: -We're screwed. -Why?
translation.zh:
我们死定了
显然现在大家都在找我们

translation.en: -Everyone's looking for us, apparently. -They won't find us.
translation.zh:
我们死定了
显然现在大家都在找我们 他们找不到我们的

translation.en: Of course they won't, that's not the point.
translation.zh: 他们当然找不到我们 但这不是重点

translation.en: -What is? -Mallard wants us to get to
translation.zh:
他们当然找不到我们 但这不是重点 马拉德要我们马上去
基多的美国大使馆

translation.en: the U.S. embassy in Quito immediately.
translation.zh:
马拉德要我们马上去
基多的美国大使馆

translation.en: For our own safety. The ambassador's waiting for us, okay?
translation.zh:
为了我们的安全
大使在等我们 懂吗？

translation.en: It's probably a few hours' drive from Machala to Quito.
translation.zh: 从马恰拉开车到基多大概几个小时

translation.en: I promised I'd call him as soon as we got there.
translation.zh: 我承诺一到就会打给他

translation.en: -As in, a few hours from now. -Right.
translation.zh:
-所以就是几小时后
-对

translation.en: -What are you gonna do? -Nothing.
translation.zh:
-你打算怎么做？
-什么都不做

translation.en: -Because I'm not gonna call him. -Why not?
translation.zh:
-因为我不会打给他
-为什么？

translation.en: Because if I call him, he'll call the embassy to arrange us to be flown home,
translation.zh:
-因为我不会打给他
-为什么？ 因为如果我打给他
他就会打给大使馆安排我们回美国

translation.en: -and they'll say we're not there. Right? -Right. Yeah.
translation.zh:
-他们会说 我们根本不在 好吗？
-对

translation.en: What will he think if you don't call him at all?
translation.zh: 那若你完全不打给他 他会怎么想？

translation.en: -That something's happened to us. -We're just missing?
translation.zh:
-我们出事了
-我们失踪了？

translation.en: Yeah, that we're missing. They can trace us, though.
translation.zh: 对 我们失踪了 但他们能追踪我们

translation.en: That's what they'd do if they thought we were missing.
translation.zh:
他们如果以为我们失踪了
就会这么做

translation.en: -So, we'd have to destroy our phones. -We only have to destroy the SIM card.
translation.zh:
-所以我们得毁掉手机
-我们只要毁掉SIM卡就好

translation.en: -Right. -Oh, God.
translation.zh:
-对
-老天

translation.en: How can you destroy it? It doesn't...
translation.zh: 要怎么毁掉？这根本…没办法

translation.en: You can't even... Shall I just swallow it?
translation.zh:
要怎么毁掉？这根本…没办法 -我要吞下去吗？
-好

translation.en: Yeah, swallow it so they can trace it straight to your ass!
translation.zh:
-我要吞下去吗？
-好 这样他们就可以直接追踪到
你的屁股了！

translation.en: Why didn't we just go back in the first place and just say:
translation.zh: 为什么我们不回到一开始 直接说

translation.en: "Sorry, we threw away the tickets and passports"?
translation.zh:
“对不起
我们把机票和护照弄丢了”就好？

translation.en: Why did you throw the fucking ticket and the passport away in the first place?
translation.zh:
你为什么一开始
要把他妈的机票和护照丢了？

translation.en: -[shouts] That's the fucking question! -Shut up!
translation.zh:
-这才是他妈的问题
-闭嘴

translation.en: What will they think we're arguing about downstairs?
translation.zh: 他们在楼下会想我们在吵什么

translation.en: -I don't care! -Are you mental?
translation.zh:
-我不在乎！
-你疯了吗？

translation.en: Fucking hell. There. It's destroyed, okay?
translation.zh: 该死的 操 好了 毁掉了 行吗？

translation.en: What are they gonna say, "What were you arguing about last night?"
translation.zh:
他们会怎么说？
“你们昨晚在吵什么？”

translation.en: -In their house. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 这是他们家

translation.en: You're such a pig.
translation.zh: 你真是个混蛋

translation.en: [Mallard] We haven't heard from them since 10:00 last night.
translation.zh: 我们从昨晚十点就没他们的消息了

translation.en: Maybe they lost communication, maybe they've been arrested.
translation.zh:
或许他们的通讯中断了
或许他们被逮捕了

translation.en: Whatever the case, we need to be very quiet about this for now.
translation.zh: 无论如何 我们都得先暂时不声张

translation.en: All right, drop everything, check the hotels, hospitals,
translation.zh: 把手边的事都放下 去查旅馆 医院

translation.en: anybody we might know in the area who might have seen them.
translation.zh: 在那区域任何可能见过他们的人

translation.en: And at some point, we have to let Ian's wife know.
translation.zh:
我们到必要时
必须要通知伊恩的老婆

translation.en: -Leave it with me. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-我去通知吧
-好

translation.en: -[phone rings] -I need a map of Ecuador, ASAP.
translation.zh:
-我去通知吧
-好 -我要厄瓜多尔的地图 马上
-好

translation.en: -[Claire] Got it. -Q365 News. Hold on.
translation.zh:
-我要厄瓜多尔的地图 马上
-好 Q365新闻 请稍后

translation.en: It's Barrymore at the New York Post.
translation.zh: 是纽约邮报的贝瑞摩尔

translation.en: [Barrymore] There's that little guy.
translation.zh: 小家伙 你好啊

translation.en: Okay, Barrymore, I gotta tell you, I don't have time. What?
translation.zh:
贝瑞摩尔 我得说 我现在没空
找我干嘛？

translation.en: I know you've got a big problem. I just spoke to my correspondent in Quito.
translation.zh:
我知道你遇到大麻烦了
我刚跟我在基多的特派员谈过

translation.en: I don't know anything. I can't say anything.
translation.zh: 我什么都不知道 什么都不能说

translation.en: I need photos for a profile piece. Should I send a courier?
translation.zh:
我需要照片做个特别报道
我该派快递去吗？

translation.en: -Being a bit hasty, aren't you? -If I know about it
translation.zh:
-有点太急了吧你
-如果我知道了

translation.en: then other people do, too, and it'll get out.
translation.zh: 那其他人也知道了 消息会传出去

translation.en: Send your courier.
translation.zh: 派你的快递来

translation.en: Okay, story's out. Change of plans. You're going on at 7:00.
translation.zh:
消息传出去了 改变计划
你们七点要开播

translation.en: Just say we've lost contact with our special correspondents in Ecuador
translation.zh:
就说我们和在厄瓜多尔的特派员
失去联络了

translation.en: -but let's not panic everyone. -Right.
translation.zh:
-但大家先不要慌
-好

translation.en: -You got this. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你搞得定的
-好

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Oh, hold on.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: Excuse me, have you got PC Gamer?
translation.zh: 不好意思 你有电子游戏杂志吗？

translation.en: Look. Look.
translation.zh: 你看 你看

translation.en: And uh, and the New York Post.
translation.zh: （于厄瓜多尔失踪） 还要一份纽约邮报

translation.en: Thanks. Cheers.
translation.zh: 谢了

translation.en: -[Eleanor] Do you want a drink? -[Claire] Uh, no, I'm fine. Thank you.
translation.zh:
-你要喝一杯吗？
-不用了 谢谢

translation.en: You know, when you're in broadcasting...
translation.zh: 你知道 在广播时

translation.en: any number of things can happen, but they aren't necessarily serious.
translation.zh: 会发生很多事情 但不见得都很严重

translation.en: If that's the case, then they're gonna call any minute now.
translation.zh:
如果是这样的话
他们可能随时会打电话来

translation.en: Do you know Frank well?
translation.zh: 你跟弗兰克熟吗？

translation.en: Uh, Frank?
translation.zh: 弗兰克？

translation.en: We've been working together for about five years.
translation.zh: 我们共事了大约五年

translation.en: He's a great journalist.
translation.zh: 他是很棒的记者

translation.en: Bit of a loner. But I've been working with Ian even longer.
translation.zh: 有点独来独往 但我和伊恩共事更久

translation.en: He's such a kind soul.
translation.zh: 他真的是个好人

translation.en: -You must be worried sick. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你一定很担心吧
-对

translation.en: What do you mean, "loner"?
translation.zh: 你说独来独往是什么意思？

translation.en: Well... you know what? Actually, I could do with a drink.
translation.zh: 那…这样吧 我想我也能来一杯

translation.en: Aren't you gonna record our conversation?
translation.zh: 你不打算录下我们的对话吗？

translation.en: Oh, no. This is strictly off the record.
translation.zh: 不…这绝对不会列入纪录

translation.en: Because I tell you, it is a very interesting story.
translation.zh: 因为我告诉你 这是个很有趣的故事

translation.en: My life, before I met Ian.
translation.zh: 我的生活 在我认识伊恩之前

translation.en: -Before? Yeah. -Yeah, you know, special interest.
translation.zh:
-之前？
-对 你有兴趣吗？

translation.en: Because it might make people engage with their plight even more.
translation.zh:
因为这样或许能让人们
更在意他们的困境

translation.en: Well, maybe next time.
translation.zh: 或许下次吧

translation.en: I don't wanna add to your... stress.
translation.zh: 我不想增添你的负担

translation.en: I mean, sometimes I think that my life has been too dramatic.
translation.zh:
我是说 有时候我觉得
我的人生真的太戏剧化了

translation.en: And I almost wish it was more, like, uh... plain and boring.
translation.zh:
我得说 我几乎都希望
我的人生可以更平淡无趣

translation.en: -I should go. Sorry. I'm so sorry. -Clumsy.
translation.zh:
-我该走了 抱歉 真的很抱歉
-笨手笨脚的

translation.en: [Claire] Nothing yet leads us to give in to anxiety,
translation.zh: 至今没有消息 让我们感到焦虑

translation.en: even if foreign journalists today incur increasingly real risks.
translation.zh: 现在外籍记者的危险越来越大

translation.en: [man] Thank you, Claire Maddox. And coming up next, baseball.
translation.zh:
谢谢你 克莱尔麦道克斯
接下来请看棒球新闻

translation.en: If you don't get in touch at all, they're going to think you're dead.
translation.zh:
如果你们完全不联络
他们会以为你们死了

translation.en: -Or taken hostage, or, yeah. -Taken hostage?
translation.zh:
-或是被当成人质了
-人质？

translation.en: -Yeah. -We're taken hostage.
translation.zh:
-对
-我们被当成人质了

translation.en: -What do you mean? -If we can fake being in Ecuador,
translation.zh:
-什么意思？
-若我们可以假装在厄瓜多尔

translation.en: -we can fake being taken hostage. -That's bad.
translation.zh:
-就可以假装被当人质
-糟糕的主意

translation.en: -That's not a good idea. -[Frank] It's not bad, it's genius.
translation.zh:
-这不是个好主意
-不是坏主意 是天才

translation.en: You're a genius.
translation.zh: 你是个天才

translation.en: -Am I? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-是吗？
-对

translation.en: -He's a genius. -He is a smart man.
translation.zh:
-他是个天才
-他是个聪明人

translation.en: -It's a very good idea. -[Finch] Is it?
translation.zh:
-这是个非常棒的想法
-是吗？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: -[Domingo] Baby, you're blocking Ian. -[Brigida] Oh, sorry.
translation.zh:
-宝贝 你挡住伊恩了
-抱歉

translation.en: -[Domingo] Okay. Okay. -[Finch] Okay.
translation.zh:
-宝贝 你挡住伊恩了
-抱歉 -好
-好

translation.en: [Domingo] It's recording.
translation.zh: 在录了

translation.en: -And... -[Brigida] Wait, wait, wait!
translation.zh:
-开始
-等等… （厄瓜多尔解放阵线）

translation.en: -Okay. -[Domingo] Okay.
translation.zh:
-好
-好

translation.en: Ready?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-好了
-好

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 大家好

translation.en: Don't smile and say "hello." For God's sake.
translation.zh:
看在老天的份上
不要笑着说“大家好”

translation.en: -What do you mean? -You're in mortal danger.
translation.zh:
-什么意思？
-你现在有生命危险

translation.en: You got two guys that wanna kill you. Are they high heels?
translation.zh:
有两个人打算要杀你
那是高跟鞋吗？

translation.en: -What rebel soldier wears high heels? -They make my legs look longer.
translation.zh: 有哪种叛军会穿高跟鞋的？ 这样我腿看起来比较长啊

translation.en: -It looks good, baby. [growls] -[Brigida] Thank you, baby.
translation.zh:
-很美 宝贝
-谢谢你 宝贝

translation.en: Okay, no smiling. No hello. Just straight to it.
translation.zh: 好 不要笑 不要打招呼 直接开始

translation.en: We are hostages of the Ecuadorian Liberation Front.
translation.zh: 我们成了厄瓜多尔解放阵线的人质

translation.en: Um, and I am talking to the president of the United States here
translation.zh: 我要对美国总统说话

translation.en: when I say the situation is simple.
translation.zh: 情况很简单

translation.en: If you do not pay the ransom, we will be executed.
translation.zh: 如果你们不付赎金 我们就会被处决

translation.en: -Stop. Okay. -What?
translation.zh:
-停 好了
-什么？

translation.en: Why are you talking so casually, so nonchalant?
translation.zh: 你为什么这么轻松 不在乎的样子？

translation.en: You gotta be begging. Begging for your life.
translation.zh: 你要恳求 为了你的命而哀求

translation.en: This guy, he wants to kill you.
translation.zh: 这家伙想杀你

translation.en: He wants to stick you like a pig, so you need to beg.
translation.zh:
他要把你像只猪一样叉起来
所以你要求饶

translation.en: -A nice word to your family, to your wife. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-对你的家人 太太说点好话
-好

translation.en: The lens? That's the whole world, right there.
translation.zh: 镜头？那是全世界

translation.en: -You gotta connect. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-你要投入
-好

translation.en: -Do you understand? -Yeah, yeah, yeah. Okay.
translation.zh:
-你懂吗？
-好…懂了

translation.en: President.
translation.zh: 总统

translation.en: Beg the president, mention the family, yeah, yeah, yeah. Okay.
translation.zh: 恳求总统 提到家人 好…好

translation.en: No smiling.
translation.zh: 不要笑

translation.en: We are hostages of the Ecuadorian Liberation Front,
translation.zh: 我们成了厄瓜多尔解放阵线的人质

translation.en: and I beg you, Mr. President, please help us.
translation.zh: 我恳求您 总统先生 请救救我们

translation.en: Also, uh, tell my family I love them, tell my wife--
translation.zh:
另外告诉我的家人我爱他们
告诉我太太…

translation.en: Why are you asking the president to run errands for you?
translation.zh: 你为什么要让总统帮你跑腿啊？

translation.en: -Ugh. I don't know, I just-- You said-- -Talk to them directly, to the lens.
translation.zh:
-我不知道 你刚刚说…
-直接对着镜头跟他们说话

translation.en: -Dear Mr. President, wife, family-- -Stop.
translation.zh:
-亲爱的总统先生 老婆 家人
-停

translation.en: -Get up. -[groans] What?
translation.zh:
-起来
-干嘛？

translation.en: -[Frank] Okay. Shake it out. -Oh!
translation.zh: 好 甩一甩

translation.en: -[Brigida] Take that, American pig! -That wasn't part of the video.
translation.zh:
-吃一记吧 美国猪
-那不是说好的剧本

translation.en: -What was that for? -To help you get into your role.
translation.zh:
-你干嘛这样？
-帮助你入戏

translation.en: Who am I? Daniel Day-Fucking-Lewis? Why am I doing this
translation.zh:
我又不是他妈的丹尼尔戴路易斯
如果你是迷人的播报员

translation.en: -if you're the charismatic broadcaster? -Exactly. I can't do it.
translation.zh:
-为什么要我做这种事？
-就是这样我才不行

translation.en: No one's gonna feel sorry for me.
translation.zh:
没人会为我感到难过
我长得帅又迷人

translation.en: I got the looks, I got the charm, I got the body. No sympathy.
translation.zh:
没人会为我感到难过
我长得帅又迷人 身材又好 没人会同情我
回过头来看 你…

translation.en: You, on the other hand, you begging for your life? It's pathetic.
translation.zh:
身材又好 没人会同情我
回过头来看 你… 你恳求别人饶命？很可悲

translation.en: It's like an ugly runt, mongrel dog that no one wants,
translation.zh: 就像一只没人想要 且必须被杀掉的

translation.en: -that has to be put down. -Yeah, I get the point.
translation.zh:
-又丑又小的杂种狗
-我懂了

translation.en: [whispers] Didn't have to hit me.
translation.zh: 你没必要揍我

translation.en: [Brigida] You've got this, Finch.
translation.zh: 你可以的 芬奇

translation.en: My name is Ian Finch. This is Frank Bonneville.
translation.zh: 我叫伊恩芬奇 他是弗兰克邦尼维尔

translation.en: We work for the New York radio station Q365 News. [Frank] You wanna see these?
translation.zh: 我们都在纽约电台Q365新闻工作

translation.en: No, I don't wanna see anything. And I'm not talking to you.
translation.zh: 我什么都不想看 我也不想跟你说话

translation.en: As you wish.
translation.zh: 如你所愿

translation.en: In the end, you were great, though.
translation.zh: 最后你很棒 很抱歉我这么做了

translation.en: I'm sorry for what I did, but it was for authenticity,
translation.zh:
最后你很棒 很抱歉我这么做了 但是为了真实性 你知道吗？
是有正当理由的

translation.en: -for the good of the cause. -Didn't have to hit me that hard.
translation.zh:
但是为了真实性 你知道吗？
是有正当理由的 那不用那么用力揍我吧？
所以我现在可以揍你吗？

translation.en: So, can I hit you now?
translation.zh:
那不用那么用力揍我吧？
所以我现在可以揍你吗？

translation.en: -[scoffs] You can try. -No, I should just be allowed to hit you.
translation.zh:
-你试试看啊
-不 我应该现在可以揍你才对

translation.en: -Why? -For the good of the cause.
translation.zh:
-为什么？
-我有正当理由

translation.en: But it wouldn't be, that would just be you getting revenge.
translation.zh: 才怪 你只是想报复

translation.en: Not fair.
translation.zh: 不公平

translation.en: Here you go. There it is.
translation.zh: 好了 就是这个了

translation.en: Take it over to the radio station, make sure no one sees you.
translation.zh: 拿去电台 不要被别人发现

translation.en: [Finch] My name is Ian Finch. This is Frank Bonneville.
translation.zh: 我叫伊恩芬奇 他是弗兰克邦尼维尔

translation.en: We work for the New York radio station Q365 News.
translation.zh: 我们都在纽约电台Q365新闻工作

translation.en: We were reporting here on the unrest in Ecuador
translation.zh: 我们到厄瓜多尔来报道叛乱

translation.en: when we were taken hostage by the Ecuadorian Liberation Front.
translation.zh:
但却被厄瓜多尔解放阵线
抓走当成人质

translation.en: We have not been harmed. If America submits to their demands,
translation.zh:
我们还没受伤害
只要美国能满足它们的要求

translation.en: we will be set free to return to the United States.
translation.zh: 我们就会被释放 回到美国

translation.en: -Well, they're still alive. -If their demands are not met, however,
translation.zh:
-他们还活着
-如果他们的要求没有被满足

translation.en: we will be executed, never to see our families again.
translation.zh:
我们就会被处决
再也看不到我们的家人

translation.en: Please take these people seriously. They want money to fund their cause.
translation.zh:
请认真看待这些人
他们需要钱 资助他们的目标
